main event: A witness observed a round-shaped object that made a high-pitched sound and moved away in two waves, disappearing in a dull glow. During the observation, 25 aircraft departed the nearby air force base in two waves.
interesting points: The object was observed for about two minutes.
The witness also observed one spark-like object in the sky during the intervals.
The sighting occurred in Farmington, Arkansas.
The Air Force concluded that the sighting was likely caused by the aircraft from the nearby 340th Bombardment Wing conducting a training exercise.
The report mentions similar sightings of up to 7 objects in the same area on previous nights.
